comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content: Do you know if these photos were studio portraits? I can't imagine people wearing these clothes during their trip!

comment.author: 32951986@N05
comment._content: According to the NYPL collection guide some might have been detainees: "While waiting for what they needed to leave the island (an escort, or money, or travel tickets), some of these immigrants may have been persuaded to pose for Sherman's camera, donning their best holiday finery or national dress, which they had brought with them from home. "

comment.author: 34149053@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called folk costumes, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
